articles.author: Lisa Fickenscher
articles.title: PepsiCo dumps juice brands including Tropicana in $3.3 billion deal - New York Post
articles.description: PepsiCo said is selling its 70-year-old juice business, including its most famous brand, Tropicana.
articles.content:
PepsiCo said it is selling its 70-year-old juice business, including its most famous brand, Tropicana.
The soda and snack giant said Tuesday it will get $3.3 billion for selling a 39 percent stake i… [+1975 chars]
